00001 import sys
00002 import io
00003 
00004 MAX_PARAMS = int(sys.argv[1])
00005 
00006 #=======================================================================================
00007 
00008 header = '''
00009 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00010 #define MAKE_DELEG()            Delegate<FT>* pdeleg = static_cast<Delegate<FT>*>(deleg)
00011 #define MAKE_DELEGM()           MAKE_DELEG(); \\
00012                                                         FunctionData fd = pdeleg->GetFunctionData(); \\
00013                                                         fd.SetThisPtr(reinterpret_cast<detail::GenericClass*>(*(void**)args[0])); \\
00014                                                         pdeleg->SetFunctionData(fd);
00015 #define MAKE_CALL                       (*pdeleg)
00016 #define UNPCK_ARG(T, ARG)       (*(T*)args[ARG])
00017 #define UNPCK_RET()                     (*(RT*)res)
00018 #define UNPCK_RET_REF()         (*(RT**)res)
00019 '''
00020 
00021 function_invokers_ret = '''
00022 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00023 
00024 template<class FT, %targs%, class RT>
00025 void invoke_generic(DelegateBase* deleg, void** args, void* res)
00026 { MAKE_DELEG(); UNPCK_RET() = MAKE_CALL(%args%); }
00027 
00028 template<class FT, %targs%, class RT>
00029 void invoke_generic_ref(DelegateBase* deleg, void** args, void* res)
00030 { MAKE_DELEG(); UNPCK_RET_REF() = &MAKE_CALL(%args%); }
00031 '''
00032 
00033 function_invokers_noret = '''
00034 template<class FT, %targs%>
00035 void invoke_generic_noret(DelegateBase* deleg, void** args, void* res)
00036 { MAKE_DELEG(); MAKE_CALL(%args%); }
00037 '''
00038 
00039 method_invokers_ret = '''
00040 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00041 
00042 template<class FT, %targs%, class RT>
00043 void invoke_generic_m(DelegateBase* deleg, void** args, void* res)
00044 {
00045         MAKE_DELEGM();
00046         UNPCK_RET() = MAKE_CALL(%args%);
00047 }
00048 
00049 template<class FT, %targs%, class RT>
00050 void invoke_generic_m_ref(DelegateBase* deleg, void** args, void* res)
00051 {
00052         MAKE_DELEGM();
00053         UNPCK_RET_REF() = &MAKE_CALL(%args%);
00054 }
00055 '''
00056 
00057 method_invokers_noret = '''
00058 template<class FT, %targs%>
00059 void invoke_generic_m_noret(DelegateBase* deleg, void** args, void* res)
00060 {
00061         MAKE_DELEGM();
00062         MAKE_CALL(%args%);
00063 }
00064 '''

00069 with open('invoke_generic.inc', 'w') as file:
00070 
00071         file.write(header)
00072 
00073         for i in range(0, MAX_PARAMS + 1):
00074                 
00075                 block = function_invokers_ret           
00076 
00077                 args = ""
00078                 for j in range(0, i):
00079                         args += "UNPCK_ARG(A" + str(j + 1) + ", " + str(j) + "), "
00080 
00081                 targs = ""
00082                 for j in range(1, i+1):
00083                         targs += "class A" + str(j) + ", "
00084 
00085                 block = block.replace("%args%", args[:-2])
00086                 block = block.replace("%targs%", targs[:-2])
00087                 block = block.replace("%rti%", str(i))
00088 
00089                 file.write(block)
